definition: angle/corner/horn/horn-shaped/unit of money equal to 0.1 yuan, or 10 cents (a dime)/CL:個|个[ge4]
role (theater)/to compete/ancient three legged wine vessel/third note of pentatonic scale

sentences.english: His hall was decorated with deer horns.
sentences.chinese: 他的大廳用鹿角裝飾着。

sentences.english: When Larkshimi tried to killed the chital, she has to avoid the sharp buckhorn which will be very dangerous to the tiger.
sentences.chinese: 當老虎試圖咬死白斑鹿的時候，就要避開鋒利的鹿角。

sentences.english: He's seen a pair of antlers, he's turning into a stag.
sentences.chinese: 從倒影中他看到一對鹿角，他已經變成一頭雄鹿了。

sentences.english: It is interesting that their antlers are lost every year and new ones grow the next year.
sentences.chinese: 有趣的是，鹿角每年脫換一次，第二年又長出新的來。

sentences.english: Antlers are living tissue criss-crossed with blood vessels and nerve endings.
sentences.chinese: 鹿角是有血管和神經節的十字型活組織。

sentences.english: The adult males spend the summer growing antlers and getting fat .
sentences.chinese: 雄性成鹿在夏天生長鹿角並養肥身體。

sentences.english: Antlers are the hard and bony points that grow on the heads of male deer.
sentences.chinese: 鹿角就是長在公鹿頭上的角。

sentences.english: The structure of the carved antler indicates its growth stage was spring or summer.
sentences.chinese: 被刻畫的鹿角的結構表明其生長期處於春季或夏季。

sentences.english: A large staghorn calculus is seen obstructing the renal peli-calyceal system.
sentences.chinese: 圖中可見巨大的鹿角樣結石嵌頓於腎盂腎盞系統。

sentences.english: He was going to hang the horns of the antler on the wall as a trophy.
sentences.chinese: 他將把鹿角掛在牆上作爲紀念品。

sentences.english: The conservation process ends in the end of summer, and then antlers are sold.
sentences.chinese: 鹿角一直被保存至夏末，然後就可賣出。

sentences.english: Stag have large branch-like horns which are called antlers.
sentences.chinese: 雄鹿有被稱爲多叉鹿角的，像大樹枝般的角。

sentences.english: Objective: To evaluate the surgical treatment of huge staghorn stone.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討巨大鹿角狀腎結石的手術方法。

sentences.english: Xanthogranulomatous pyelonephritis and staghorn calculus are rare in children.
sentences.chinese: 黃色肉芽腫腎盂腎炎和鹿角石皆罕見於兒童。

sentences.english: They have enormous antlers and manes of leaves that flow down their backs.
sentences.chinese: 他們擁有巨大的鹿角和樹葉狀的靈魂圍繞在身後。

sentences.english: The antlers are huge, with a large number of top points.
sentences.chinese: 鹿角非常大，有很多個分岔。

definition: Père David's deer (Elaphurus davidianus), species of deer native to China that is critically endangered
variant of 榔頭|榔头[lang2 tou5]
Jiguan district of Jixi city 雞西|鸡西[Ji1 xi1], Heilongjiang
